file.name: odin.yaml
file.content:
#https://mermade.org.uk/openapi-converter
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://localhost:8080'
info:
  version: '3.0'
  title: Odin API
  description: ODIN UI Services API
paths:
  /JTasker/startRun:
    post:
      tags:
        - JTasker
      summary: Start JTasker Run
      operationId: JTasker_startRun
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: './resources/urn_jsonschema_com_issinc_odin_display_CreatePlan.json'
        required: true
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: array
                items:
                  type: string
        '500':
          description: Server Error
